page.title: 20 CREDITS & ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
page.content: The following have contributed to compiling our entry: {The Bishop of Llandaff School} Michael de Rio, Christopher Deacy, Andrew Rowland, Paula Lewis, Manaine Sharp, Sally Fawcett, Nicola Harrison, Bridget Williams, Liesel Taylor, Joanne Martin, Claire Minett, Dayle Parfitt, Andrew Nunn, Mark Hindess, Mark Lewis, Mark Cadman, William Pateron, Ceri Bailey, James Pexton, Daniel Jones, Edward Watt, Sara Gibbard Jones, Kathryn Hughes, Simon Whitaker, David Hensman, Dafydd Walters, Julian John, Simon O'Hare, Mrs Osmolska, Mr Day. {Llandaff City Junior School} Beverley Hems, Andrew Furst, Pippa Kenyon, Kate Wilson. {Holy Family Junior School}
